channel.title: Appeal Request: 3-Day Ban
channel.description:
Hi, I just got a 3-day ban for the username "Heil Hitler", but in that game someone (with the username "Evil") told me that his friend had already gotten banned for using a similar username so I had already decided to never use that sort of username again. Please reverse my ban, I won't use that sort of username ever again. Thanks.
In case anyone was wondering I used that name to fit with someone else's who had chosen "Mein Fuhrer". Before that I had only had "Hitler" in my name twice, probably less than 1% of my games. I don't like Hitler and I love Jews so I'm not a nazi and it was intended to be funny not offensive.

item.title: Appeal Request: 3-Day Ban
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
We’ll believe you after your ban lifts in a few days ~ be good!
